nodes.text: Jedi Mickey had a secret mission to Endor to try to use the Force to defeat the Empire and Darth Vader with Princess Leia and 2 Ewoks.

Jedi Mickey's Secret Mission first appeared in the Hasbro toy line Star Wars: Star Tours as a multi-figure toy pack as part of the 2015 edition of Star Wars Weekends, an annual Star Wars festival hosted at Disney's Hollywood Studios theme park of the Walt Disney World Resort. The pack, which includes Jedi Mickey and other Disney characters portrayed as Star Wars characters, such as Goofy as Darth Vader, Minnie Mouse as Princess Leia, and Chip & Dale as Ewoks. The pack also includes action figure accessories. The pack was sold exclusively at Disney Parks.
